_train_data_structure.name: str, video name
_train_data_structure.video: array[height, width, number of frames], video frames
_train_data_structure.box: array[height, width], bounding box of the valve
_train_data_structure.label: array[height, width, number of frames], label of the valve

_test_data_structure.name: str, video name
_test_data_structure.video: array[height, width, number of frames], video frames
